name: mini-blockchain-project
description: The Cryptocurrency API project is an implementation that interacts with the CoinCap API to retrieve data on the top 100 cryptocurrency coins. It provides a single API endpoint that retrieves the list of coins, saves them in a database, and returns the sorted list based on their growth in the last 24 hours. The project aims to provide a simple and convenient way to access and analyze cryptocurrency data.
author: Vishal Singh
